section.name: Contents
section.p: Naming core contains the core JNDI implementation. The JNDI context implementation is in the NamingContext class. Context access control and thread/classloader binding are provided by ContextBindings. Resource references, env references and links are also supported, as are Synchronized Contexts. The SelectorContext provides dynamic delegation of JNDI operations to contexts bound to running threads or classloaders (set up in ContextBindings).

section.name: Usage
section.p: This library can be used by itself to provide core JNDI services for a a container or standalone application, but no resource factories, xml configuration, JNDI URL factories or file contexts are provided in core.
